SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT deact.TRANS_TMX_DEACTIVATE_ID, (SELECT CASE WHEN (Select trunc(response_date) from ELP_TRANS_TMX_DEACTIVATE where attempt= (SELECT MAX(attempt) from ELP_TRANS_TMX_DEACTIVATE where cert_id=deact.cert_id) AND cert_id=deact.cert_id ) is null THEN 'N' WHEN (Select trunc(response_date) from ELP_TRANS_TMX_DEACTIVATE where attempt= (SELECT MAX(attempt) from ELP_TRANS_TMX_DEACTIVATE where cert_id=deact.cert_id) AND cert_id=deact.cert_id ) is not null THEN 'Y' END AS Status FROM DUAL) as show_checkbox, GETDESCRIPTIONFROMLISTITEM(deact.TRANS_TYPE_ID,:language_id) as Trans_Type, to_Char(deact.TRANS_SCHEDULED_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY') as TRANS_SCHEDULED_DATE, cert.CERT_NUMBER AS CERT_NUMBER, deact.ATTEMPT, deact.MOBILE_NUMBER, deact.SUPPLEMENTARY_SERVICE_CODE, deact.COMMERCIAL_SERVICE_CODE, deact.ERROR_CODE, deact.ERROR_MSG, deact.RESPONSE_XML, to_Char(deact.RESPONSE_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY') as RESPONSE_DATE, deact.HIDE, deact.CREATED_DATE, deact.CREATED_BY, deact.MODIFIED_DATE, deact.MODIFIED_BY FROM ELP_TRANS_TMX_DEACTIVATE deact inner join (select max(ATTEMPT) as attempt, cert_id FROM ELP_TRANS_TMX_DEACTIVATE where trunc(response_date) is not null group by cert_id ) bb on deact.cert_id = bb.cert_id and deact.attempt = bb.attempt inner join ELP_CERT cert on deact.cert_id = cert.cert_id where (deact.hide is null or deact.hide <> 'Y') AND (error_code <> '0') and rownum < :row_num --dynamic_where_clause
